typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pDefaultCountry as string ('Australia')
}
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getCompany
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer,
		sync_status as string,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getAssessor
source(output(
		companyid as integer,
		AssessorId as integer,
		UserId as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Title as string,
		Mailing_StreetNumber as string,
		Mailing_StreetName as string,
		Mailing_Suburb as string,
		Mailing_Postcode as string,
		Mailing_State as string,
		Billing_StreetNumber as string,
		Billing_StreetName as string,
		Billing_Suburb as string,
		Billing_Postcode as string,
		Billing_State as string,
		Phone as string,
		Email as string,
		JoinedDate as timestamp,
		AccreditationDate as timestamp,
		AccreditationExpiryDate as timestamp,
		AccreditationNumber as string,
		EnergyFlag as boolean,
		WaterFlag as boolean,
		WasteFlag as boolean,
		batch_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getStageAssessors
getAssessor, getCompany join(getAssessor@member_company_id == getCompany@member_company_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(getAssessor@salesforce_company_id))) ~> AlterRow1
Join1 derive(D_DefaultMailingCountry = $pDefaultCountry,
		D_DefaultBillingCountry = $pDefaultCountry,
		D_RatingTypes = $pDefaultCountry) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer,
		sync_status as string,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		salesforce_company_id = getCompany@salesforce_company_Id,
		id = getAssessor@id,
		Mailing_Country = D_DefaultMailingCountry,
		Billing_Country = D_DefaultBillingCountry
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
